alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Franklin; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 8:40PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN, NORTHWESTERN FAIRFIELD AND SOUTHWESTERN LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM EDT... At 840 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Groveport, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Reynoldsburg, Gahanna, Pickerington, Bexley, Heath, Pataskala, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Baltimore, Buckeye Lake, Hebron, Millersport, Fairfield Beach, Beechwood Trails, Summit Station, Granville South, Harbor Hills, Whitehall and Etna. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 102 and 129. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 103 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
